DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the ability to reduce the number of OR personnel required while performing the following procedures: colon resections, anti-reflux/hiatal hernia surgery with the AutoLap system compared with the standard operation.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Laparoscopic Procedures With and Without the Aid of the AutoLap System- a Robotic Camera Holder
